about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Paradise Accessories — your reliable partner in premium clothing accessories manufacturing

history.title: Our History
history.text: Paradise Accessories was founded with the goal of providing clothing manufacturers with high-quality tags, labels, and accessories. Over the years, we have established ourselves as a reliable partner for brands across Central Asia.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We strive to help every brand create a unique identity through quality accessories. Our goal is to provide products that are not only functional but also reflect your brand values.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our labels and services

productionCapacity.question: What's your production capacity?
productionCapacity.answer: We have a production capacity of 5 million labels per month. Our state-of-the-art facility operates 24/7 with multiple production lines to ensure we can meet both small and large orders efficiently.

rushOrders.question: Do you offer rush orders?
rushOrders.answer: Yes, we offer express production with 3-day turnaround available at a 40% premium. Our standard production time is 7-10 business days, but we can accommodate urgent orders for customers who need faster delivery.

fileFormats.question: What file formats do you accept?
fileFormats.answer: We accept AI (Adobe Illustrator), PDF, EPS, and PNG files with specifications. For best results, we recommend vector formats (AI, EPS, PDF) at 300 DPI or higher. Our design team can also help convert your files if needed.

pantoneColors.question: Can you match Pantone colors exactly?
pantoneColors.answer: Yes, using our computerized color matching system, we can match Pantone colors accurately to delta E <1.5. We maintain a comprehensive Pantone library and can provide color proofs before production begins.

defectPolicy.question: What's your defect replacement policy?
defectPolicy.answer: We offer 100% replacement for any manufacturing defects found within 90 days of delivery. Our quality control process includes multiple inspection stages, resulting in a 99.8% quality rate. If you find any defects, contact us immediately for replacement.

internationalShipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes, we ship to 50+ countries worldwide using trusted carriers like DHL and FedEx. All international shipments include full tracking information. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination and can be calculated at checkout.

moq.question: What is your minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
moq.answer: Our flexible MOQ starts at just 500 pieces, making us accessible for both small businesses and large enterprises. However, we offer better pricing for larger quantities, with discounts starting at 1,000 pieces.

samples.question: Can you provide samples before production?
samples.answer: Yes, we offer free sample packs for the first 50 requests each month. Samples typically include our most popular materials and finishes so you can feel the quality before placing your order. Samples are shipped within 3-5 business days.
